page.title: 01SWAINSWICK,BATH,AVON.
page.content: {LANDSCAPE} This is a rural area of great natural beauty with rolling hills down to two valleys.It is mostly pastureland separated by hedges and a few dry stone walls on the top of the hills.There are small patches of deciduous woodland_hazel,oak and horse_chestnut trees. It is sparsely populated,houses are concentrated into the small villages of Swainswick,Woolley,Tadwick,Langridge and Lansdown. There are few amenities,no street lights,no public transport,no shops,no Post_Offices.There are telephones,electricity and gas in some areas only. One main trunk road serves the area. Plans under discussion to re_route. . .
